abstract: Vikram S. Pandit, the bank’s chief executive, reflects on what was a “make or break” year for him.
snippet: Vikram S. Pandit, the bank’s chief executive, reflects on what was a “make or break” year for him.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup‘s chief executive, took a brief pause from a family vacation in India to praise the bank’s employees for what he called a “crucial year” in the “transformation and rebirth of the company.”
